channel.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
channel.description:
Okay so I have this photoshop right...
I read somewhere you need these two dll files for it to work on ubuntu/linux/etc. I added them to the .wine/system/system32 folder.
Now, here is my current problem. I have the photoshop folder on my desktop for easy access but i right click photoshop.exe tell it to run with wine and nothing happens. No errors, nothing.
Help please :(

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

t4:

VM pls

Virtual Machine? I’m sure a compatibility layer like WINE would be a lot more efficient.

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:12, topic:425968”]Try running that Gecko installation script in the second link it gave you. If that doesn’t work, then just try Photoshop anyways.

Put these two files in your system32 folder:
http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvcr80
http://www.dlldump.com/download-dll-files_new.php/dllfiles/A/atmlib.dll/5.1Build226/download.html[/quote]thanks installed gecko then had to change a directory everything seems to be working now <3 u

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Try running that Gecko installation script in the second link it gave you. If that doesn’t work, then just try Photoshop anyways.

Put these two files in your system32 folder:
http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvcr80
http://www.dlldump.com/download-dll-files_new.php/dllfiles/A/atmlib.dll/5.1Build226/download.html

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

okay more progress…it downloaded the fonts by the looks of it but it isn’t doing gecko i tried to get gecko via winetricks but it says I still need to install.

allisonbrown@ubuntu:~$ sudo apt-get install msttcorefonts
[sudo] password for allisonbrown:
Reading package lists… Done
Building dependency tree
Reading state information… Done
Note, selecting ‘ttf-mscorefonts-installer’ instead of ‘msttcorefonts’
ttf-mscorefonts-installer is already the newest version.
The following package was automatically installed and is no longer required:
libfile-homedir-perl
Use ‘apt-get autoremove’ to remove them.
0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove and 297 not upgraded.
allisonbrown@ubuntu:~$ winetricks msxml6 gdiplus gecko
Executing w_do_call msxml6
msxml6 already installed, skipping
Executing w_do_call gdiplus
gdiplus already installed, skipping
Executing w_do_call gecko
Executing load_gecko

Please install gecko in /usr/share/wine per http://wiki.winehq.org/Gecko. http://winezeug.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/install-gecko.sh is an easy script to do that. Then you should never need to do ‘winetricks gecko’ again.

You opted in, so reporting 'gecko ’ to the winetricks maintainer so he knows which winetricks verbs get used and which don’t. Use --optout to disable future reports.
allisonbrown@ubuntu:~$ winetricks gecko
Executing w_do_call gecko
Executing load_gecko

Please install gecko in /usr/share/wine per http://wiki.winehq.org/Gecko. http://winezeug.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/install-gecko.sh is an easy script to do that. Then you should never need to do ‘winetricks gecko’ again.

You opted in, so reporting 'gecko ’ to the winetricks maintainer so he knows which winetricks verbs get used and which don’t. Use --optout to disable future reports.
allisonbrown@ubuntu:~$

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Try “winetricks msxml6 gdiplus gecko”.

Also, “sudo apt-get install msttcorefonts”.

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:8, topic:425968”]Try running “winetricks vcrun2008”. Also, try running a later version of wine, if you are not already.[/quote] well, progress is coming along! just a couple more errors <3

It actually opened photoshop but I can’t do anything cause I get these errors. I appreciate the help thus far

allisonbrown@ubuntu:~$ wine “C:\Program Files\PS\Photoshop.exe”
err:shell:HCR_GetFolderAttributes should be called for simple PIDL’s only!
fixme:system:SetProcessDPIAware stub!
fixme:ntdll:NtLockFile I/O completion on lock not implemented yet
fixme:advapi:SetNamedSecurityInfoW L"C:\Program Files\Common Files\Adobe\Adobe PCD\cache" 1 -2147483644 0x21b84c 0x21b858 0x21b938 (nil)
fixme:win:EnumDisplayDevicesW ((null),0,0x32e818,0x00000000), stub!
fixme:win:EnumDisplayDevicesW ((null),0,0x32e818,0x00000000), stub!
fixme:wbemprox:wbem_locator_ConnectServer 0x670d610, L"root\CIMV2", (null), (null), (null), 0x00000000, (null), (nil), 0x32eb64)
fixme:font:WineEngRemoveFontResourceEx (L"C:\Program Files\PS\Required\\ADMUI3.fon", 0, (nil)): stub
fixme:dwmapi:DwmIsCompositionEnabled 0x32ed9c
fixme:wtsapi:WTSRegisterSessionNotification Stub 0x200e0 0x00000001
fixme:appbar:SHAppBarMessage unknown msg: 4
fixme:appbar:SHAppBarMessage unknown msg: 4
fixme:dciman:DCICreatePrimary 0x10f4 0xee922ac
fixme:dciman:DCICreatePrimary 0x1110 0xee92cc4
fixme:win:LockWindowUpdate (0x200e0), partial stub!
fixme:win:LockWindowUpdate ((nil)), partial stub!
fixme:appbar:SHAppBarMessage unknown msg: 4
fixme:ole:CoResumeClassObjects stub
fixme:advapi:SetNamedSecurityInfoW L"C:\Program Files\Common Files\Adobe\Adobe PCD\cache" 1 -2147483644 0x667883c 0x6678848 0x66adb68 (nil)
fixme:win:EnumDisplayDevicesW ((null),0,0x32e910,0x00000000), stub!
fixme:win:EnumDisplayDevicesW ((null),0,0x32eac8,0x00000000), stub!
fixme:file:MoveFileWithProgressW MOVEFILE_WRITE_THROUGH unimplemented
2011-12-22 14:54:12 : INFO PlugPlugTerminate called
2011-12-22 14:54:12 : ERROR PlugPlugTerminate: PlugPlugErrorCode_internalError (PlugPlugRegisterCallbacks and PlugPlugSetup must be called first)

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

Try running “winetricks vcrun2008”. Also, try running a later version of wine, if you are not already.

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

ziplock:

Retry that last command except… Finish the quotation marks. :o

allisonbrown@ubuntu:~$ wine “C:\Program Files\PS\Photoshop.exe”
wine: Call from 0x68452479 to unimplemented function msvcp90.dll.??0?$basic_string@GU?$char_traits@G@std@@V?$allocator@G@2@@std@@QAE@PBGI@Z, aborting
err:module:attach_process_dlls “AdobeOwl.dll” failed to initialize, aborting
err:module:LdrInitializeThunk Main exe initialization for L"C:\Program Files\PS\Photoshop.exe" failed, status 80000100
allisonbrown@ubuntu:~$

lowbrow:

Photoshop + ubuntu, worst fucking idea ever in the record of worst ideas. Like a fat lady running outside in 100o weather in a leotard.

I don’t like gimp so I will get this working if it’s the last thing I ever do!

Read full topic

item.title: Photoshop cs5 with ubuntu 11.10
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

well seeing as u have a Linux Distro, and u are useing WINE, which i think is unstable…You should Delete PS Cs5 and install Gimp.

REAL HELP: re install WINE, then put all the files in the File storage/Linux drive, or just your /usr/. or with the .DLL, are you sure you have the right ones?

Read full topic
